contexts.context: The <mark>ogre</mark> does what ogres can, Deeds quite impossible for man,...
The ogre does what <mark>ogres</mark> can, Deeds quite impossible for man, but one prize...
...but one prize is beyond his reach: The <mark>ogre</mark> cannot master Speech. About a subjugated plain,...
...plain, Among its desperate and slain, The <mark>ogre</mark> stalks with hands on hips, While drivel gushes...
